channel.title: Atlanta Westside
channel.itunes:author: Walter Henegar
channel.itunes:subtitle: aim for restoration
channel.itunes:summary: Sermons from Atlanta Westside Church. For additional resources, visit www.atlantawestside.org. Older sermons are also available by emailing the office at info@atlantawestside.org.

item.itunes:subtitle: Jonah 1:1-8

item.title: This Changes Everything
item.dc:creator: Walter Henegar
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark 11:12-33
item.itunes:author: Walter Henegar
item.description: We return this week to the Gospel of Mark - a series we started in September 2012. We plan to conclude the series right at Easter this year. This week's sermon is from Mark 11:12-33, with Pastor Walter preaching.

item.itunes:subtitle: Isaiah 9:6

item.title: Wonderful Counselor
item.dc:creator: Walter Henegar
item.itunes:subtitle: Isaiah 9:6
item.itunes:author: Walter Henegar
item.description: We're interrupting our series in the Gospel of Mark for the season of Advent. This first Sunday is the first of four messages that will be taken from Isaiah 9:6. "For to us a child is born, to us a son is given; and the government shall be upon his shoulder, and his name shall be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace."
item.itunes:summary: We're interrupting our series in the Gospel of Mark for the season of Advent. This first Sunday is the first of four messages that will be taken from Isaiah 9:6. "For to us a child is born, to us a son is given; and the government shall be upon his shoulder, and his name shall be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace."

item.title: The Credit of Christ
item.dc:creator: Stephen Maginas
item.itunes:subtitle: Romans 4:1-12
item.itunes:author: Stephen Maginas
item.description: Rev. Stephen Maginas joins us this week to preach from Romans 4:1-12. Stephen is the new RUF campus minister at Emory University, and will be back to preach at Westside once more next month.
item.itunes:summary: Rev. Stephen Maginas joins us this week to preach from Romans 4:1-12. Stephen is the new RUF campus minister at Emory University, and will be back to preach at Westside once more next month.

item.title: My Horn is Exalted
item.dc:creator: Carson Pittman
item.itunes:subtitle: I Samuel 2:1-11
item.itunes:author: Carson Pittman
item.description: We take another break from our summer series in Joshua to consider a follow-up message to last week's sermon from I Samuel. Today's sermon from Associate Pastor, Carson Pittman, comes from I Samuel 2:1-11.
item.itunes:summary: We take another break from our summer series in Joshua to consider a follow-up message to last week's sermon from I Samuel. Today's sermon from Associate Pastor, Carson Pittman, comes from I Samuel 2:1-11.

item.title: Comfort for the Brokenhearted
item.dc:creator: Michael Phillips
item.itunes:subtitle: I Samuel 1:1-20
item.itunes:author: Michael Phillips
item.description: Rev. Michael Phillips is the new RUF minister at Georgia Tech, and was eager to fill the pulpit for us after just relocating to Atlanta this past week. He begins his ministry at Tech this fall, taking the place of Aaron Jeffrey. (RUF is the campus ministry of our denomination, the Presbyterian Church in America.) Michael preached from I Samuel 1:1-20.
item.itunes:summary: Rev. Michael Phillips is the new RUF minister at Georgia Tech, and was eager to fill the pulpit for us after just relocating to Atlanta this past week. He begins his ministry at Tech this fall, taking the place of Aaron Jeffrey. (RUF is the campus ministry of our denomination, the Presbyterian Church in America.) Michael preached from I Samuel 1:1-20.

item.title: Why Your Favoritism is Killing You and How to be Free
item.dc:creator: Zach Bradley
item.itunes:subtitle: James 2:1-13
item.itunes:author: Zach Bradley
item.description: We're excited to welcome Rev. Zach Bradley to Westside this week, filling the pulpit for us while Pastor Walter continues his summer sabbatical. Zach and his wife, Robin, are working to plant a church here in Brookhaven, and we've been eager hosts for their launch team occasionally over the last few months. The sermon comes from James 2:1-13.
item.itunes:summary: We're excited to welcome Rev. Zach Bradley to Westside this week, filling the pulpit for us while Pastor Walter continues his summer sabbatical. Zach and his wife, Robin, are working to plant a church here in Brookhaven, and we've been eager hosts for their launch team occasionally over the last few months. The sermon comes from James 2:1-13.

item.title: Release and Receive
item.dc:creator: Walter Henegar
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark 1:12-20
item.itunes:author: Walter Henegar
item.description:
Rev. Walter Henegar preached from Mark 1:12-20.

Correction: The preacher, who is bad at math, described Jesus' 40 days in the wilderness as "seven weeks and a day." In point of fact, 40 days is only five weeks and five days. Please forgive him.
item.itunes:summary: Rev. Walter Henegar preached from Mark 1:12-20. Correction: The preacher, who is bad at math, described Jesus' 40 days in the wilderness as "seven weeks and a day." In point of fact, 40 days is only five weeks and five days. Please forgive him.
